subtitle: The public doesn't hear about that.
Is the current situation as scary as the media says it is?
Absolutely not!
[It's time to wake up!]
My effort here is to say,
the beliefs that you are getting from the media
are toxic.
[Share it to as many as possible]
Are you living in fear at this moment
are you concerned that the immediate future
might see you get a flu
and then you 're gonna see the picture
"I'm gonna die!"
"Oh, my God, I could be a victim! I could die!"
"I could have this serious illness!"
These are programs
and there are ways to change the programs.
One I can talk about the most this one that I use,
the one that I've experienced that was most effective.
[The Solution]
The most rapid way of reprogramming
those programs that are not supporting us.
[You must unlearn what you have been programmed to believe since birth]
When you start to think
behaviours are automatically controlled by subconscious programs,
which is like auto-pilot.
And these programs came from other people.
And up to 70% of them are disempowering self-sabotaging beliefs.
We are living a life where we think consciously "I'm creating what I want"
but not recognize it.
95% of our life is not coming from creative wishes,
is coming from the programs.
Our life is a print-out of our programs.
If you are in fear, if you are in struggle,
if you are in need, in desire and can't get there,
it's not because the Universe won't give it to you.
It's almost inevitably that your program does not support that destination.
The words of the professional become your compass.
If he says that "I am in trouble"
then, my mind is, immediately, gonna say:
"Oh, my God! The professional told me I am in trouble!"
The function of mind is going to manifest that experience.
So, my effort here is to say
the beliefs that you're getting from the media are toxic.
You can change these beliefs, there are ways to change the programs.
The two natural ways of changing the program are:
Self-Hypnosis, which is how a child learns programs in the first 7 years.
After age 7 we acquire new programs through the process of repetition,
repeating something over and over again, then, we learn it and becomes a habit.
And, then, there is a new way of healing these programs called Energy Psychology.
One that I can talk about the most, it's the one that I use,
the one I am most familiar with.
So, I am not saying the other ones are less effective.
I am just gonna say that it's the one that I've experienced
that was the most effective in changing my life.
Once I understood what I wanted to change
(that was the harder part of what program I want to put in)
using a Psych-K process, developed by Rob Williams,
in my experience, was the most rapid way of
reprogramming those programs that are not supporting us.
Programs that are creating a disability just because of the belief program.
I found that using the Psych-K changed my life so profoundly
that I have rewritten programs, that once scared me.
I used to live in fear.
Now, my life is like I live Heaven on Earth.
Why? Because eliminating the programs that disempowered me
led to programs that empowered me.
I live by the Psych-K process because many of the issues I had in my life,
like even writing the book "The Biology of Belief"
I couldn't have written it because of limiting subconscious beliefs
Thank God I had Psych-K!
It was amazing because after changing that belief
the book came out.
I started to recognize my limiting beliefs.
Now, I am one of the happiest people around.
For what reason?
I've reprogrammed the fear!
I've reprogrammed the bad programming I got from my parents!
